newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco WPI rose 0.1 percent in February.
newsitem.headline: Morocco WPI rose 0.1 percent in February.

text.p: Morocco's Wholesale Price Index (WPI) rose 0.1 percent in February, up from minus 0.3 percent in January, the Statistics Directorate said.
The index reached 356.1 points in February against 355.8 points in the previous month, the directorate said in its latest bulletin received on Monday.
The variation was mainly due to industrial products which rose by 1.1 percent, it added.
The base year for the index is set at 231 points in 1977.
